attributes.action: GIVE MORE MONEY TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS THAT THEY HAVE TO USE ON SETTING UP AND RUNNING YOUTH COUNCILS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am currently on a youth council in my local borough, but i know that they are very rare around the country. our job is to form a council that meet at the council offices and discuss matters arising. we are all teenagers and we give up our own free time. our main aim is to represent the youth of the borough and provide them with a voice. we try to organise activities and get our views heard. but there is one thing that every existing youth council and all new ones need. funding.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
